name: Tobi's Adventure
description:
Created for UE4 Summer Jam 2019 - Make It Count.

Your best friend is ill. You have collected the last available healing potion from the village medic.You have 5 minutes left to deliver the potion to save your friend. This is your last chance. MAKE IT COUNT.

Controls 

Movement- WASD

Jump- Space

Sprint- Shift

Music: https://www.purple-planet.com
